feed.title: Organizr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Organizr: JWT Tokens
entry.content:
NEW JWT token system implemented
NEW Set announcement for Guests on homepage
Secure cookies on HTTPS
Bug fixes throughout

entry.title: New release for Organizr: Updates and Fixes
entry.content:
Attention - work on Organizr V2 has started - please be patient
Added Transmission to homepage
Added Discord Settings Widget
Added Email templates
Added Custom Email templates
Added ability to login with email if username is not email
Fixed Ombi API
Fixed Password Managers saving over passwords
Fixed Plex Admin Login issues
Fixed Now Playing music
Other Fixes

entry.title: New release for Organizr: Maintenance Release
New release for Organizr: Bug and Security Fix
entry.content:
Fix misc code issues and fixed some security issues...
Organizr V2 Beta is out!

entry.title: New release for Organizr: Update before FEB 28 to keep v1 working
entry.content:
IMPORTANT!!! THIS IS FINAL RELEASE BEFORE V2
If you do not update before Feb 28th, please edit config.php to change your branch from master to v1-master to keep your install from being messed up by branches changing.

IF YOU WISH TO UPDATE TO V2
You will need to install the v2-master branch - if you are on docker, use this image: organizrtools/organizr-v2
This is a complete rewrite - you will not be able to just update, you will need to setup from scratch at the moment
